page.title: 06USES OF ELPHINSTONE CHURCH
page.content:
SOME PEOPLE PLAY THE FLUTE IN THE ELPHINSTONE FLUTE BAND.THE FLUTE BAND HAS BEEN GOING FOR THREE YEARS.THE FLUTE BAND IS ON MONDAYS AND TUESDAYS FROM 7PM TO 8PM.WE WEAR A BLACK AND WHITE UNIFORM AND A HAT AND SASH.PEOPLE FROM ELPHINSTONE PRIMARY GO TO THE BAND.JAMES FLEMING IS THE BAND MASTER.SOMETIMES WE GO TO GLASGOW TO SEE THE FOOTBALL TEAM GLASGOW RANGERS.
THE SUNDAY SCHOOL HAS BEEN GOING FOR YEARS.THE PERSON WHO RUNS THE SUNDAY SCHOOL IS WILLIAM MCFARLAN.THE CHURCH HAS A PIANO AND AN ORGAN.ABOUT 12 OR 14 CHILDREN COME TO THE SUNDAY SCHOOL. THEY ARE MAINLY FROM THE VILLAGE.THE MINISTER FROM TRANENT,MR MILLAR,COMES TO TAKE SERVICES MOST WEEKS.THE SUNDAY SCHOOL IS SMALL BUT COMFORTABLE.
